answers.answer: Congratulations. I hope he gets better soon so you can take him home. <3

Awe ! My god is so SOooo! Amazing  :) congratulations to you and your family .. my little bun is due in June. ..  I can only anticipate how your feeling. The joy your little one is finally here ! Haha congrats take care ..
Congrats momma God Bless you both.
I hope you take him home soon!! God bless u all.
Congrats on your little bundle of joy:)!
Congratulations! And i hope you and your baby get well soon :DMy prayers go out to you and your baby boy.

My son was born at 31 weeks also due to pre-eclampsia. At first doctors and nurses told me that he would stay in the NICU til closer to his due date, but after doing everything that was required of him, he was able to go home at 34 weeks. I hope your baby gets to go home soon! Feedings by mouth was the last step for mine.

Thanks ladies!! My son got transferred to a leavel 3 NICU last night, he wasn't breathing up to part, I am so sad because I am a c section mom and could not go with him due to having to stay at the hospital where I had him to recover. My husband did go with him and has been with him, that I am very very thankful for. Please keep my baby in your prayers please it means a lot.. Thanks..
Cngrats <3333 ALLAH bless u both always .. :)
Prayers go out to you, your little bun-bun and your family!!!! Keep us posted!

question: Hi ladies today at exactly 8:15am my son has arrived via c section at 34w 0d, he was 5lb 6oz 17in long he is really cute and doing good although he does need some help with respiratory. I have been in the hospital for over a week now with preeclampsia that is why I delivered early during this pregnancy. We named him Esai Rodolfo,Rodolfo is after my dad. Thanks for reading.
title: my son has arrived
